quote.quotepara: I think(hope...), i'm finished with the dependency editor now. See rev 9860

body.para: I can't seem to be able to use the "Modify selected relations to:" in my wc... am I doing something wrong?

Also... did the nested view of the dependencies (present in you sooner proposal) dissappear? The tree view is highly useful, though we agreed in that only the direct relationship should be editable...
